statements.select:
select a.RelationIdOfOldMan,a.RelationIdOfFamily,b.OldManId,b.OldManName,b.Gender as OldManGender,b.Birthday as OldManBirthday,b.IDNo as OldManIDNo,isnull(b.Tel,b.Mobile) as OldManContactPhone, c.FamilyMemberId,c.FamilyMemberName,c.Gender as FamilyMemberGender,c.IDNo as FamilyMemberIDNo,dbo.FUNC_Tol_IsNullOrEmpty(c.Tel,c.Mobile) as FamilyMemberContactPhone from Oca_OldManFamilyInfo a inner join Oca_OldManBaseInfo b on a.OldManId = b.OldManId inner join Oca_FamilyMember c on a.FamilyMemberId = c.FamilyMemberId where a.Status =1 b.OldManId=#OldManId# isnull(b.Status,1)=#OldManStatus# isnull(c.Status,1)=#FamilyMemberStatus# b.AreaId=#AreaId# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select (select ItemName from Sys_DictionaryItem where DictionaryId='11003' and ItemId = a.RelationIdOfOldMan) as RelationNameOfOldMan, b.OldManName,c.FamilyMemberName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_IsNullOrEmpty(c.Tel,c.Mobile) as FamilyMemberContactPhone,a.FamilyMemberId from Oca_OldManFamilyInfo a inner join Oca_OldManBaseInfo b on a.OldManId = b.OldManId inner join Oca_FamilyMember c on a.FamilyMemberId = c.FamilyMemberId where a.Status =1 b.OldManId=#OldManId# isnull(b.Status,1)=#OldManStatus# isnull(c.Status,1)=#FamilyMemberStatus# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select a.*,b.CallNo,b.CallNo2,b.CallNo3,b.LocateFlag,b.FenceRadius,b.GovTurnkeyFlag from Oca_OldManBaseInfo a left join Oca_OldManConfigInfo b on a.OldManId = b.OldManId
a.OldManId=#OldManId# a.Status=#OldManStatus# a.AreaId=#AreaId# b.GovTurnkeyFlag=#GovTurnkeyFlag# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select 1 as NoUse from Oca_OldManBaseInfo a left join Oca_OldManConfigInfo b on a.OldManId = b.OldManId
a.OldManId=#OldManId# a.Status=#OldManStatus# a.AreaId=#AreaId# a.AreaId2=#AreaId2# a.AreaId3=#AreaId3# b.GovTurnkeyFlag=#GovTurnkeyFlag# $WhereClause$

select (select ItemName from Sys_DictionaryItem where DictionaryId='11003' and ItemId = a.RelationIdOfOldMan) as RelationNameOfOldMan, (select ItemName from Sys_DictionaryItem where DictionaryId='11003' and ItemId = a.RelationIdOfFamily) as RelationNameOfFamily from Oca_OldManFamilyInfo a where a.Status =1 and a.OldManId=#OldManId# and a.FamilyMemberId= #FamilyMemberId#

select a.*,b.RelationIdOfFamily,b.RelationIdOfOldMan,b.OldManId,b.Status FamilyInfoStatus,b.Id FamilyInfoId from Oca_FamilyMember a inner join Oca_OldManFamilyInfo b on a.FamilyMemberId=b.FamilyMemberId
a.FamilyMemberId=#FamilyMemberId# a.Id=#Id# a.CheckInTime>=#CheckInTime_Start# a.CheckInTime<=#CheckInTime_End# a.Status=#Status# a.FamilyMemberName=#FamilyMemberName# a.Gender=#Gender# a.IDNo=#IDNo# a.Tel=#Tel# a.Mobile=#Mobile# a.AreaId=#AreaId# b.RelationIdOfFamily=#RelationIdOfFamily# b.RelationIdOfOldMan=#RelationIdOfOldMan# b.OldManId=#OldManId# b.Status=#FamilyInfoStatus# $WhereClause$

select * from Oca_OldManBaseInfo where OldManId in( select distinct OldManId from (select x.OldManId from Oca_CallService as x, Oca_CallService as Y where x.CallServiceId!=y.CallServiceId and x.Caller=y.Caller and Y.CallServiceId=#CallServiceId# union select a.OldManId from Oca_OldManBaseInfo a inner join Oca_CallService b on a.Tel=b.Caller or a.Mobile=b.Caller where b.CallServiceId=#CallServiceId# ) c where OldManId<>'A9999999-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' )
isnull(Status,1)=#OldManStatus# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select base.OldManName,config.CallNo,config.CallNo2,config.CallNo3 from Oca_OldManConfigInfo config,Oca_OldManBaseInfo base where config.OldManId=base.OldManId
isnull(base.Status,1)=#OldManStatus# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$
